Title: The Starling
Synopsis: A woman adjusting to life after a loss contends with a feisty bird that's taken over her garden — and a husband who's struggling to find a way forward.

Title: Angamaly Diaries
Synopsis: After growing up amidst the gang wars of his hometown, Vincent forms an entrepreneurial squad of his own and ends up on the wrong side of the law.

Title: A Champion Heart
Synopsis: When a grieving teen must work off her debt to a ranch, she cares for a wounded horse that teaches her more about healing than she expected.

Title: Anjaam
Synopsis: A wealthy industrialist’s dangerous obsession with a flight attendant destroys her world, until she takes matters into her own hands to exact revenge.

Title: Bright Star
Synopsis: This drama details the passionate three-year romance between Romantic poet John Keats – who died tragically at age 25 – and his great love and muse.

Title: Dhanak
Synopsis: A movie-loving 10-year-old and her blind little brother trek to meet Indian superstar Shah Rukh Khan for help in getting the boy an eye operation.

Title: Gurgaon
Synopsis: When the daughter of a wealthy family returns from college, she gets a frosty welcome from her brother, who has problems – and plans – of his own.

Title: In the Cut
Synopsis: After embarking on an affair with the cop probing the murder of a young woman, an insular schoolteacher suspects her lover was involved in the crime.

Title: Shikara
Synopsis: A couple must strive to remain resilient after regional hostilities drive them from their beloved home into a refugee camp.

Title: A Cinderella Story
Synopsis: Teen Sam meets the boy of her dreams at a dance before returning to toil in her stepmother's diner. Can her lost cell phone bring them together?

Title: Je Suis Karl
Synopsis: After most of her family is murdered in a terrorist bombing, a young woman is unknowingly lured into joining the very group that killed them.

Title: An Unfinished Life
Synopsis: A grieving widow and her daughter move in with her estranged father-in-law in Wyoming, where time allows them to heal and forgive.

Title: Blade Runner: The Final Cut
Synopsis: In a smog-choked dystopian Los Angeles, blade runner Rick Deckard is called out of retirement to snuff a quartet of escaped "replicants."

Title: Chappie
Synopsis: In a futuristic society where an indestructible robot police force keeps crime at bay, a lone droid evolves to the next level of artificial intelligence.

Title: Clear and Present Danger
Synopsis: When the president's friend is murdered, CIA Deputy Director Jack Ryan becomes unwittingly involved in an illegal war against a Colombian drug cartel.

Title: Cliffhanger
Synopsis: Ranger Gabe Walker and his partner are called to rescue a group of stranded climbers, only to learn the climbers are actually thieving hijackers.

Title: Cold Mountain
Synopsis: This drama follows a wounded Civil War soldier making the long journey home, while his faraway love fights for survival on her deceased father's farm.

Title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
Synopsis: When Mick "Crocodile" Dundee and his family land in Los Angeles, they soon learn some lessons about American life in this comedy sequel.

Title: Dear John
Synopsis: While on summer leave, a U.S. soldier falls for a college student. But when he's forced to reenlist, their handwritten letters hold the lovers together.

Title: Do the Right Thing
Synopsis: On a sweltering day in Brooklyn, simmering racial tensions between residents rise to the surface and ignite rage, violence and tragedy.

Title: El patrón, radiografía de un crimen
Synopsis: A lawyer defends an illiterate man whose exploitation by a cruel boss while working as a butcher in Buenos Aires led to tragedy. Based on a true case.

Title: Extraction
Synopsis: When a retired CIA agent is kidnapped, his son, a government analyst, embarks on an unauthorized mission to find him and halt a terrorist plot.

Title: Freedom Writers
Synopsis: While her at-risk students are reading classics such as "The Diary of Anne Frank," a teacher asks them to keep journals about their troubled lives.

Title: Green Lantern
Synopsis: Test pilot Hal Jordan harnesses glowing new powers for good when he wears an otherworldly ring and helps an intergalactic force stop a powerful threat.

Title: House Party
Synopsis: Grounded by his strict father, Kid risks life and limb to go to his best friend Play's big bash but experiences one obstacle after another.

Title: House Party 2
Synopsis: Kid goes off to college with scholarship money but when Play loses Kid's tuition funds to a shady music promoter, they devise a wild plan to raise cash.

Title: House Party 3
Synopsis: After Kid gets engaged, Play plans to throw the biggest bachelor party ever. But every celebration for these two always comes with complications.

Title: I Got the Hook Up
Synopsis: After getting their hands on a misdirected shipment of cell phones, two hustlers try to cash in by hawking the merchandise from the back of their van.

Title: In Too Deep
Synopsis: Rookie cop Jeffrey Cole poses as a drug dealer to take down a crime lord and soon gets caught up in an underworld of bribery, intimidation and murder.

Title: Initial D
Synopsis: By day, an 18-year-old delivers tofu for his father, a retired race car driver; but by night, it's the teen's turn to take the wheel.

Title: Janoskians: Untold and Untrue
Synopsis: Follow the story of three Australian brothers and their two friends who became an international sensation by posting pranks and gags on YouTube.

Title: Labyrinth
Synopsis: In Jim Henson's fantasy, teen Sarah embarks on a life-altering quest to rescue her little brother from the clutches of a treacherous goblin.

Title: Letters to Juliet
Synopsis: By responding to a letter addressed to Shakespeare's tragic heroine Juliet Capulet, an American woman in Verona, Italy, is led in search of romance.

Title: Level 16
Synopsis: In a bleak academy that teaches girls the virtues of passivity, two students uncover the ghastly purpose behind their training and resolve to escape.

Title: Love Don't Cost a Thing
Synopsis: A nerdy teen tries to make himself cool by association when he convinces a popular cheerleader to pose as his girlfriend.

Title: Love in a Puff
Synopsis: When the Hong Kong government enacts a ban on smoking cigarettes indoors, the new law drives hard-core smokers outside, facilitating unlikely connections.

Title: Mars Attacks!
Synopsis: As flying saucers head for Earth, the president of the United States prepares to welcome alien visitors but soon learns they're not coming in peace.

Title: Marshall
Synopsis: This biopic of Thurgood Marshall, the first Black U.S. Supreme Court justice, centers on his pivotal work in a sensational case as an NAACP lawyer.

Title: My Boss's Daughter
Synopsis: A young man house-sits for his mean boss, hoping to use it as an opportunity to win the heart of the boss's daughter, on whom he's long had a crush.

Title: Mystery Men
Synopsis: A team of far-from-super heroes try to earn respect by springing into action when brave and dashing Captain Amazing disappears.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Synopsis: Director Sergio Leone's sprawling crime epic follows a group of Jewish mobsters who rise in the ranks of organized crime in 1920s New York City.

Title: Open Season 2
Synopsis: Elliot the buck and his forest-dwelling cohorts must rescue their dachshund pal from some spoiled pets bent on returning him to domesticity.

Title: Osmosis Jones
Synopsis: Peter and Bobby Farrelly outdo themselves with this partially animated tale about an out-of-shape 40-year-old man who's the host to various organisms.

Title: Poseidon
Synopsis: A tidal wave spells disaster for a ship of New Year's Eve revelers when it capsizes the mammoth vessel, sending passengers into a battle for survival.

Title: Rhyme & Reason
Synopsis: The world and culture of rap song topics such as race, violence, police, family and sex are examined by hip-hop performers from both coasts.

Title: Same Kind of Different as Me
Synopsis: A wealthy couple whose marriage is on the rocks befriends a local homeless man who changes their perspectives in this inspiring true story.

Title: School of Rock
Synopsis: Musician Dewey Finn gets a job as a fourth-grade substitute teacher, where he secretly begins teaching his students the finer points of rock 'n' roll.

Title: Snervous Tyler Oakley
Synopsis: The inspiring Internet star and LGBT advocate shares an intimate view of his life and relationships during his international "Slumber Party" tour.

Title: Tears of the Sun
Synopsis: A Navy SEAL is sent to a war-torn African jungle to rescue a doctor, only to realize he must also save the refugees in the physician's care.

Title: The Blue Lagoon
Synopsis: Two shipwrecked children, stranded for years on a deserted island, fall in love as teenagers and attempt to forge a life in the isolated paradise.

Title: The Golden Child
Synopsis: A fast-talking L.A. social worker goes through a series of traps and terrors to find a kidnapped Tibetan child with mystical powers.

Title: The Guns of Navarone
Synopsis: During World War II, British forces launch an attack designed to take out the massive Nazi cannons that guard a critical sea channel.

Title: The Interview
Synopsis: Seth Rogen and James Franco star in this provocative comedy about two journalists recruited by the CIA after they arrange an interview with Kim Jong-un.

Title: The Nutty Professor
Synopsis: After being made fun of for his weight, a kind and brainy professor takes a dose of a revolutionary formula that changes more than just his appearance.

Title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
Synopsis: R.J. travels to Georgia for his parents' 50th anniversary. But after pompously flaunting his Hollywood lifestyle, he must examine what he's become.

Title: In the Line of Fire
Synopsis: A twisted yet ingenious killer torments a veteran Secret Service agent who's haunted by his failure years ago to save President John F. Kennedy.

Title: 2 Alone in Paris
Synopsis: A bumbling Paris policeman is doggedly determined to capture the master thief that repeatedly eludes him, even when they're the last two men on Earth.

Title: Thimmarusu
Synopsis: Eight years after a young man is framed for murder, an up-and-coming lawyer re-opens the case, beginning a tricky mission to find the real culprit.

Title: Wind River
Synopsis: A tracker with the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service assists a rookie FBI agent who's investigating a teen girl's murder on a remote Wyoming reservation.

Title: C Kkompany
Synopsis: Three broke friends pose as an underworld gang for extortion, but their plan takes on a life of its own when their phony company becomes famous.

Title: EMI: Liya Hai To Chukana Padega
Synopsis: A bank hires an enigmatic and unorthodox debt collector to recover money from four borrowers who are unable to pay their loans.

Title: King of Boys: The Return of the King
Synopsis: Alhaja Eniola Salami starts anew and sets her sights on a different position of power, fueled by revenge, regret and ruthlessness.

Title: Koi Aap Sa
Synopsis: Star athlete Rohan has his eye on a beautiful art student. But when his best friend Simran experiences a crisis, he drops everything to help her.

Title: Krishna Cottage
Synopsis: True love is put to the test when another woman comes between a pair of star-crossed young lovers in this thriller.

Title: Kucch To Hai
Synopsis: A student tries to steal a test from a teacher's home, leaving him for dead after an accident. A string of murders may be the professor's revenge.

Title: Kyaa Kool Hai Hum
Synopsis: Longtime friends Rahul and Karan head to Mumbai intent on making their dreams come true, but both men are suddenly saddled with bad luck.

Title: Kyaa Kool Hain Hum 3
Synopsis: When an unlikely porn actor falls for a woman outside the industry, he employs his co-stars as a stand-in traditional family to impress her father.

Title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
Synopsis: An aspiring actor and a struggling DJ team up to pursue the ladies they love and a diamond that rightfully belongs to their oversexed dog.

Title: Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta
Synopsis: The life and career of a lawyer are thrown into chaos when his son's wish magically renders him incapable of telling a lie.

Title: LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha
Synopsis: This provocative drama examines how the voyeuristic nature of modern society affects three unusual couples in Northern India.

Title: Mission Istaanbul: Darr Ke Aagey Jeet Hai
Synopsis: A television journalist makes a risky career move by accepting a job offer from a controversial Istanbul television station.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai
Synopsis: Mumbai's top mob boss rules the underworld with honor and compassion, but his power-hungry protégé will shake up the world of organized crime.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbai Dobaara!
Synopsis: This turbulent sequel to Once Upon a Time in Mumbai carries on the saga of the gangland don Shoaib Khan, who continues pressing for more control.

Title: Ragini MMS
Synopsis: A couple out to have a sensuous weekend at a house outside of Mumbai finds it rigged with surveillance cameras and occupied by an evil entity.

Title: Ragini MMS 2
Synopsis: The horror continues when Ragini's video goes viral and a sleazy director decides to make a movie about the incident in the original house.

Title: Shootout at Lokhandwala
Synopsis: Based on a true story, this action film follows an incident that stunned a nation in the early 1990s. In Mumbai, India, the notorious gangster Maya holds off veteran cop Khan and a force of more than 200 policemen in a six-hour bloody gunfight.

Title: Shor In the City
Synopsis: When three small-time Mumbai crooks steal a bag on a train, they find that it's filled with weapons and realize that their lives may be in danger.

Title: The Dirty Picture
Synopsis: After running away from home in search of movie stardom, a village girl rises to become a prominent sex symbol.

Title: Really Love
Synopsis: A rising Black painter tries to break into a competitive art world while balancing an unexpected romance with an ambitious law student.

Title: The November Man
Synopsis: An ex-CIA agent emerges from retirement to protect an important witness, but he soon discovers that old friends can make the most dangerous enemies.

Title: The Old Ways
Synopsis: A reporter visits her birthplace in Veracruz for a story about tribal culture, only to be kidnapped by locals who believe she's demonically possessed.

Title: The Water Man
Synopsis: Desperate to save his ailing mother, 11-year-old Gunner runs away from home on a quest to find a mythic figure rumored to have the power to cheat death.

Title: Sweet Girl
Synopsis: He lost the love of his life to a pharmaceutical company's greed. Now his daughter is without a mother, and he's without justice. For now.

Title: Jeans
Synopsis: When the father of the man she loves insists that his twin sons marry twin sisters, a woman creates an alter ego that might be a bit too convincing.

Title: Like Crazy
Synopsis: A spirited exchange student and an American man fall in love in LA. But their romance faces an uphill battle when she is forced to return to England.

Title: Bombay
Synopsis: Years after they elope against their family’s wishes, a couple and their sons become caught in the throes of conflict in their city.

Title: Pahuna
Synopsis: Fleeing unrest in their native Nepal, three young siblings separated from their parents must beat the odds to survive on their own in India.

Title: Walk of Shame
Synopsis: After a night of boozy carousing, a local newscaster finds herself stranded on the streets of LA just hours before the job interview of a lifetime.

Title: The Piano
Synopsis: With her daughter and her beloved piano in tow, a mute Scottish woman arrives in New Zealand, where a gruff loner sets out to seduce her.

Title: Beckett
Synopsis: An American tourist goes on the run in Greece after a tragic accident plunges him into a political conspiracy that makes him a target for assassination.

Title: Gone for Good
Synopsis: Ten years after losing two loved ones, a man is plunged into another dizzying mystery when his girlfriend vanishes. Based on a Harlan Coben novel.

Title: Valeria
Synopsis: A writer in creative and marital crises finds support from three friends, who are also discovering themselves. Based on the novels by Elísabet Benavent.

Title: Lokillo: Nothing's the Same
Synopsis: Through songs and puns, comedian Lokillo Florez hilariously reviews how Latin Americans have adjusted to a new world where no-hugging policies prevail.

Title: Grown Ups
Synopsis: Mourning the loss of their beloved junior high basketball coach, five middle-aged pals reunite at a lake house and rediscover the joys of being a kid.

Title: Monster Hunter: Legends of the Guild
Synopsis: In a world where humans and fearsome monsters live in an uneasy balance, young hunter Aiden fights to save his village from destruction by a dragon.

Title: Brother Jekwu
Synopsis: Chasing wild success, a village hustler follows his cousin from Nigeria to Kenya and stumbles into the shady business affairs of a notorious overlord.

Title: La diosa del asfalto
Synopsis: A woman from a tough neighborhood outside Mexico City comes home a rock star, inadvertently provoking a confrontation with the ghosts of her past.

Title: The Kissing Booth 3
Synopsis: Determined to make the most of her final summer before college, Elle plans the ultimate bucket list as she navigates what comes next with Noah and Lee.

Title: The Railway Man
Synopsis: Decades after World War II, a still-shattered soldier unexpectedly falls in love and sees a bizarre coincidence bring his past back into focus.

Title: Dark Skies
Synopsis: A family’s idyllic suburban life shatters when an alien force invades their home, and as they struggle to convince others of the deadly threat.

Title: Quartet
Synopsis: To save their posh retirement home, former opera stars plan a gala recital — until the biggest diva among them refuses to sing.

Title: Slay
Synopsis: In pursuit of both success and validation, a group of tech-savvy individuals juggle intimate encounters, first impressions and romantic opportunities.

Title: The Paper Tigers
Synopsis: After reuniting as middle-aged men, three kung-fu prodigies must set their differences aside and dust off their skills to avenge their beloved mentor.

Title: Navarasa
Synopsis: From amusement to awe, the nine human emotions of Indian aesthetic theory are explored in this anthology series.

Title: Quam's Money
Synopsis: In this sequel to "New Money," Quam, a security guard turned multimillionaire, lives the good life with his fortune until he falls victim to fraud.

Title: Paranoia
Synopsis: Blackmailed by his company's CEO, a low-level employee finds himself forced to spy on the boss's rival and former mentor.

Title: The Swarm
Synopsis: A single mother breeds locusts as high-protein food, but has trouble getting them to reproduce — until she finds they have a taste for blood.

Title: Vivo
Synopsis: A music-loving kinkajou embarks on the journey of a lifetime to fulfill his destiny and deliver a love song for an old friend.

Title: Chennai Express
Synopsis: What could have been a sad journey turns joyful for Rahul when he falls in love with a woman en route to submerging his grandfather's ashes.

Title: Esperando la carroza
Synopsis: Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?

Title: Lady Boss: The Jackie Collins Story
Synopsis: "Queen of Sleaze" or feminist pioneer? Powerhouse novelist Jackie Collins created a brash sex-positive persona while hiding her private struggles.

Title: Tango Feroz
Synopsis: One of the first rock stars in Argentina, Tango leads a full life during an era of social unrest – one of both glory and despair.
When her husband is accused of taking part in an attempted military coup, a pregnant woman's life takes an emotional turn. Inspired by true events.

Title: Aftermath
Synopsis: Desperate to save their marriage, a young couple takes a deal and moves into their dream home, but disturbing events reveal the house's troubled history.

Title: American Masters: Inventing David Geffen
Synopsis: The son of Jewish immigrants, David Geffen emerged from a humble upbringing to become one of the most powerful media personalities in America.

Title: Heavy
Synopsis: Overweight Victor hides from the world making pizzas in his mother's gloomy dive until a new waitress blows in and disrupts his isolation.

Title: Ije: The Journey
Synopsis: When her sister is accused of multiple murders, a Nigerian woman travels to Los Angeles to uncover the truth and fight for her sibling’s freedom.

Title: Office Girls
Synopsis: A department store mogul has his son work incognito in a menial job to prove his worthiness, while female co-workers teach him how normal people live.

Title: Beethoven
Synopsis: A father reluctantly agrees to let his children keep a St. Bernard puppy, but the playful pooch soon turns into a full-grown engine of destruction.

Title: Beethoven's 2nd
Synopsis: After St. Bernard Beethoven sires a brood with Missy, he and the Newton kids must intervene when Missy's owner tries to sell the puppies.

Title: Beowulf
Synopsis: This deftly animated take on a legendary Old English epic tells the timeless tale of a Scandinavian hero who's known for slaying dragons.

Title: Boyka: Undisputed
Synopsis: The fourth film in the action franchise finds Boyka taking on brutal gangsters to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

Title: Catch Me If You Can
Synopsis: An FBI agent makes it his mission to put cunning con man Frank Abagnale Jr. behind bars. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.

Title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
Synopsis: When inventor Flint Lockwood makes clouds rain food, the citizens of Chewandswallow can feed themselves. But a bowl of disaster is about to overflow.

Title: Deep Blue Sea
Synopsis: Scientists conduct research on sharks in search of an Alzheimer's cure. But a dangerous shortcut leads to huge sharks with near-human intelligence.

Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Synopsis: After faking an illness to skip school, popular teen Ferris Bueller enjoys a fun-filled day in Chicago with his girlfriend and his uptight best friend.

Title: Five Feet Apart
Synopsis: A teen with cystic fibrosis shakes up her daily routine and challenges hospital protocol when she falls for a fellow patient.

Title: Freedomland
Synopsis: When a woman reports that her infant son was kidnapped by a black man, an African American detective and a white activist team up to dig for details.

Title: Good Luck Chuck
Synopsis: Every time Chuck breaks up with a girlfriend, she ends up engaged to her next boyfriend. Soon, women are dating Chuck in hopes of meeting Mr. Right.

Title: Inception
Synopsis: A troubled thief who extracts secrets from people's dreams takes one last job: leading a dangerous mission to plant an idea in a target's subconscious.

Title: Magnolia
Synopsis: Through chance, history and divine intervention, a cast of eclectic characters weaves and warps through each other's lives on a random day in California.

Title: Major Payne
Synopsis: A hardened Marine is given his marching orders and must now lead a disorderly group of mismatched cadets into a junior ROTC competition.

Title: My Girl
Synopsis: This coming-of-age charmer follows a summer in the life of an 11-year-old girl who learns about love and loss as she grapples with profound changes.

Title: My Girl 2
Synopsis: A teen makes surprising discoveries when she talks to her dead mother's high school friends for an essay about someone she admires but has never met.

Title: Open Season: Scared Silly
Synopsis: When a spooky werewolf tale scares Boog out of joining the annual camping trip, his friends hatch a plan to cure him of his fear.

Title: Pineapple Express
Synopsis: After witnessing a murder, a perpetually stoned process server and his good-natured dealer go on the run from a drug lord who's out to kill them.

Title: Planet 51
Synopsis: After landing on a planet reminiscent of 1950s suburbia, a human astronaut tries to avoid capture, recover his spaceship and make it home safely.

Title: Poms
Synopsis: After moving to a retirement community, loner Martha befriends a fun-loving neighbor and forms a cheerleading club for young-at-heart seniors.

Title: Seabiscuit
Synopsis: An ungainly-looking colt becomes a winning thoroughbred in this Depression-era drama based on the true story of champion racehorse Seabiscuit.

Title: Space Cowboys
Synopsis: A retired engineer agrees to help NASA prevent a Russian satellite from falling to Earth if he and his over-the-hill pals can man the mission.

Title: Team America: World Police
Synopsis: In this musical satire, an all-marionette police force takes on the challenging role of keeping the peace on a troubled planet.

Title: The Edge of Seventeen
Synopsis: A troubled teenager finds high school life even less bearable after she catches her childhood best friend hooking up with her popular older brother.

Title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
Synopsis: A couple's Georgia dream home becomes a living nightmare when their daughter begins to have frightening visions from the property's terrible past.

Title: The Last Boy Scout
Synopsis: Private eye Joe Hallenbeck is forced to team up with a disgraced quarterback to uncover a conspiracy by a politician and a football team owner.

Title: The Lincoln Lawyer
Synopsis: A street-wise defense lawyer who operates out of the back seat of his Lincoln lands a high-profile case that soon puts him and his family in danger.

Title: The Losers
Synopsis: After a search-and-destroy mission leads to betrayal, an elite black ops squad seeks revenge. But they must remain deep undercover to even the score.

Title: The Machinist
Synopsis: Haunted and gaunt after a prolonged bout of insomnia, factory worker Trevor Reznik begins to question his sanity amid a series of mysterious events.

Title: The Net
Synopsis: A computer analyst becomes a target after she stumbles onto a conspiracy via a mysterious floppy disk, forcing her to go on the run to clear her name.

Title: The Original Kings of Comedy
Synopsis: Comedians Steve Harvey, Cedric the Entertainer, D.L. Hughley and Bernie Mac hit the stage in an iconic stand-up concert directed by Spike Lee.

Title: Valentine's Day
Synopsis: The tripwires of modern love are exposed in a carousel involving relationships and the single life on the most romantic day of the year: February 14.

Title: Eyes of a Thief
Synopsis: After a decade in prison, a Palestinian man with a dark secret returns to the West Bank and searches for the daughter he lost long ago.

Title: Flower Girl
Synopsis: When a young florist who's long dreamed of her wedding day gets dumped by her boyfriend, she sets out to win him back with help from a handsome actor.

Title: Bartkowiak
Synopsis: After his brother dies in a car crash, a disgraced MMA fighter takes over the family nightclub — and soon learns his sibling's death wasn’t an accident.

Title: The Flash
Synopsis: A forensics expert who wakes from a coma with amazing new powers squares off against forces threatening the city in this live-action superhero romp.

Title: Department
Synopsis: Two cops form a task force to take down two mobsters, but when a sinister politician enters the picture, dubious loyalties and motives come to light.

Title: Birth of the Dragon
Synopsis: A young Bruce Lee angers kung fu traditionalists by teaching outsiders, leading to a showdown with a Shaolin master in this film based on real events.

Title: The Operative
Synopsis: Working as a Mossad spy assigned to Tehran, Rachel reaches her breaking point. Now it’s dangerously hard to tell whose side she’s on.

Title: Django Unchained
Synopsis: Accompanied by a German bounty hunter, a freed slave named Django travels across America to free his wife from a sadistic plantation owner.

Title: A Second Chance:  Rivals!
Synopsis: Crushed when she doesn't qualify for the Olympics, a now-grown Maddy Cornell finds new purpose coaching young gymnasts going up against a rival team.

Title: The Last Letter From Your Lover
Synopsis: After finding a trove of love letters from 1965, a reporter sets out to solve the mystery of a secret affair — while embarking on a romance of her own.

Title: Chhota Bheem And The Broken Amulet
Synopsis: When a stranger tries to steal an amulet from the palace, Bheem learns the sad story behind the ornament and heads to Africa to defeat the real villain.

Title: Chhota Bheem aur Krishna
Synopsis: Centuries after the end of a conqueror's rule, he is mysteriously back from the dead. It’s up to Bheem to save Dholakpur from being taken over!

Title: Jaws
Synopsis: When an insatiable great white shark terrorizes Amity Island, a police chief, an oceanographer and a grizzled shark hunter seek to destroy the beast.

Title: Cousins
Synopsis: Separated as children, three cousins with an unshakeable bond confront their painful pasts and embark on an emotional journey to find each other.

Title: Jaws 2
Synopsis: Four years after the last deadly shark attacks, police chief Martin Brody fights to protect Amity Island from another killer great white.

Title: Sanitation Day
Synopsis: Two cops must contend with the uncooperative tenants of an apartment complex as they try to solve a murder before the crime scene is wiped clean.

Title: Milkwater
Synopsis: Aimless 20-something Milo impulsively becomes a gay man’s surrogate and wrestles with the emotional complexities of her non-traditional decision.

Title: The Tambour of Retribution
Synopsis: In an impoverished neighborhood, the son of a swordsman falls in love with the daughter of a wedding singer — a taboo match in a traditional society.

Title: Cosmic Sin
Synopsis: In the year 2524, a disgraced retired general is called back into combat to help prevent an interstellar war against a hostile alien fleet.

Title: Jaws 3
Synopsis: After the staff of a marine theme park try to capture a young great white shark, they discover its mother has invaded the enclosure and is out for blood.

Title: Deep
Synopsis: Four insomniac med school students are lured into a neuroscience experiment that spirals out of control — and must find a way out before it’s too late.

Title: The Beguiled
Synopsis: During the Civil War, a wounded Union soldier takes refuge at a Southern girls school, rupturing the calm amid growing sexual tension and infighting.

Title: The Book of Henry
Synopsis: An 11-year-old vows to help a new neighbor who he suspects is in danger, and documents his efforts in a series of written entries and audio recordings.

Title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn: Part 1
Synopsis: After a dream wedding, Bella and Edward enter a new nightmare when a shocking development forces life-or-death decisions.

Title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn: Part 2
Synopsis: In the epic series' final chapter, Bella and Edward's newborn daughter forces the couple into a life-altering confrontation with the Volturi.

Title: Jaws: The Revenge
Synopsis: After another deadly shark attack, Ellen Brody has had enough of Amity Island and moves to the Caribbean – but a great white shark follows her there.

Title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
Synopsis: With a bloodthirsty enemy on a quest for revenge, Bella must reconcile her love for vampire Edward and her growing feelings for werewolf Jacob.

Title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
Synopsis: Still reeling from the departure of vampire Edward Cullen, a heartbroken Bella Swan finds comfort in her friendship with werewolf Jacob Black.

Title: Twilight
Synopsis: When Bella Swan moves in with her father, she starts school and meets Edward, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

Title: A Perfect Fit
Synopsis: Sparks fly when a fashion blogger in Bali meets a gifted shoemaker, leading her to question her commitment to her fiancé.

Title: Surf's Up
Synopsis: This Oscar-nominated animated comedy goes behind the scenes at the Penguin World Surfing Championship to get a close-up look at the inventors of surfing.

Title: A Classic Horror Story
Synopsis: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.

Title: Safe House
Synopsis: Young CIA operative Matt Weston must get a dangerous criminal out of an agency safe house that's come under attack and get him to a securer location.

Title: American Woman
Synopsis: In rural Pennsylvania, a working-class single mom must pick up the pieces and step up to raise her grandson after her daughter suddenly disappears.

Title: American Ultra
Synopsis: He's just a weed fiend going nowhere, or so he thinks. When the CIA tries to eliminate him, his long-dormant superspy training comes roaring back.

Title: Ratchet and Clank
Synopsis: Affable alien Ratchet longs to be a Galactic Ranger and might get the chance when rogue robot Clank tells him of evil Drek's plot to destroy a galaxy.

Title: Training Day
Synopsis: A rookie cop with one day to prove himself to a veteran LAPD narcotics officer receives a crash course in his mentor's questionable brand of justice.

Title: Back to Q82
Synopsis: Eager to rejoin her divorced parents, an inventor's daughter drives his time-traveling car back to 1982. But a secret crush accidentally follows.

Title: Home Again
Synopsis: A newly single mom takes in three young male filmmakers as boarders, but her estranged husband returns to complicate her new, unconventional life.

Title: Midnight Sun
Synopsis: Born with a fatal sensitivity to sunlight, a sheltered teen girl falls for her neighbor, but hides her condition from him as their romance blossoms.

Title: Rock the Kasbah
Synopsis: When a has-been music producer gets stuck in Afghanistan he discovers a girl with a wonderful voice, then has to find a way to market her talents.

Title: Brick Mansions
Synopsis: An undercover police detective partners with an ex-convict to take down a drug kingpin amid grime and crime in a walled-off Detroit housing project.

Title: Tango With Me
Synopsis: A newly married couple journeys through self-discovery and healing while dealing with the aftermath of a traumatic event on their wedding night.

Title: The Mire
Synopsis: In an early-'80s Polish town, a prostitute and a youth leader are found killed, but the police's handling of the case makes two journalists suspicious.

Title: This Little Love Of Mine
Synopsis: A workaholic lawyer returns to her island home to convince an old friend to take over his family’s company — but rekindled feelings soon get in the way.

Title: A Land Imagined
Synopsis: A cop in Singapore investigates the disappearance of a Chinese migrant construction worker who spent sleepless nights playing a mysterious video game.

Title: Har Kisse Ke Hisse: Kaamyaab
Synopsis: After a career of thankless credits, a retired actor returns for a long-awaited leading role but finds he is utterly unprepared for new-age filmmaking.

Title: InuYasha the Movie 2: The Castle Beyond the Looking Glass
Synopsis: With their biggest foe seemingly defeated, InuYasha and his friends return to everyday life. But the peace is soon shattered by an emerging new enemy.

Title: Rehmataan
Synopsis: As unemployment, drug addiction and corruption plague a society, this drama depicts the people who believe there’s still good in the world.

Title: InuYasha the Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
Synopsis: The Great Dog Demon beaqueathed one of the Three Swords of the Fang to each of his two sons. Now the evil power of the third sword has been awakened.

Title: Return of the Prodigal Son
Synopsis: Freed after spending 12 years in jail, a man's homecoming turns into a dark affair as his disillusion clashes with his family's expectations.

Title: Rise: Ini Kalilah
Synopsis: Inspired by Malaysia's 14th General Election, this film trails six individuals and the obstacles they face in the days leading up to the historic event.

Title: Si Doel the Movie 2
Synopsis: As Sarah and her child look to settle in Jakarta, Zaenab searches for answers and gets caught between defending her marriage to Doel or letting it go.

Title: InuYasha the Movie 4: Fire on the Mystic Island
Synopsis: Ai, a young half-demon who has escaped from Horai Island to try to help her people, returns with potential saviors InuYasha, Sesshomaru and Kikyo.

Title: Truckbhar Swapna
Synopsis: A taxi driver living in a Mumbai slum seeks to better his family's life by building an extension of his home while dealing with a lecherous contractor.

Title: Ujala
Synopsis: An honest man dreams of a better life for his family, but a childhood friend leads him into a world of crime that keeps happiness just out of reach.

Title: InuYasha the Movie: Affections Touching Across Time
Synopsis: A powerful demon has been sealed away for 200 years. But when the demon's son is awakened, the fate of the world is in jeopardy.

Title: Haseen Dillruba
Synopsis: Under investigation as a suspect in her husband’s murder, a wife reveals details of their thorny marriage that seem to only further blur the truth.

Title: RattleSnake - The Ahanna Story
Synopsis: In this stylish remake, a disillusioned mastermind assembles a team to pull off a series of spectacular heists — but his crimes make too many enemies.

Title: Snowpiercer
Synopsis: The Earth's remaining inhabitants are confined to a single train circling the globe as revolution brews among the class-divided cars.

Title: The 8th Night
Synopsis: With prayer beads in one hand and an ax in the other, a monk hunts down a millennia-old spirit that's possessing humans and unleashing hell on Earth.

Title: Winchester
Synopsis: The heiress to a vast firearms fortune constructs a mansion with a maze-like interior to ward off the spirits of those killed by her family's product.

Title: 6 Bullets
Synopsis: A former mercenary is lured back into the dangerous business of finding missing children when the daughter of a mixed martial arts champ is kidnapped.

Title: Air Force One
Synopsis: When terrorists hijack Air Force One with the president and his family on board, the commander-in-chief takes matters into his own well-trained hands.

Title: Austin Powers in Goldmember
Synopsis: The world's most shagadelic spy continues his fight against the diabolical Dr. Evil, who's teamed with a new foe: 1970s villain Goldmember.

Title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
Synopsis: A swingin' fashion photographer by day and a groovy British secret agent by night, superspy Austin Powers must foil the sinister schemes of Dr. Evil.

Title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Synopsis: When diabolical genius Dr. Evil travels back in time to steal superspy Austin Powers's "mojo," Austin must return to the swingin' '60s himself.

Title: Boogie Nights
Synopsis: A well-endowed busboy is taken in by a tight-knit group of 1970s porn actors and transforms himself into skin flick celebrity Dirk Diggler.

Title: Charlie's Angels
Synopsis: A tight-knit trio of specially trained agents wield weapons — and charm — as they track down stolen software in this reboot of the classic TV series.

Title: Congo
Synopsis: Eight people, some with ulterior motives, go on an expedition to the Congo, where they find a lost city protected by killer apes.

Title: Dennis the Menace
Synopsis: The bane of George's life is a little boy named Dennis. But when a cunning thief attempts to rob George, Dennis may be the only one who can stop him.

Title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison
Synopsis: Mistakenly accused of an attack on the Fourth Raikage, ninja Naruto is imprisoned in the impenetrable Hozuki Castle and his powers are sealed.

Title: Dreamy Eyes
Synopsis: Through heartbreak and betrayal, Ngan's unrequited love for his childhood best friend Hà La endures for a generation in this sweeping romance.

Title: Hampstead
Synopsis: An American widow in London forms an unexpected relationship with a man living off the grid in a beautiful park ripe for development.

Title: Kung Fu Panda
Synopsis: When a powerful villain comes after peace in his valley, a lazy panda rises to the challenge to realize his destiny and become a kung fu warrior.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 2
Synopsis: With his fists up and belly full, Po embarks on a perilous journey with the Furious Five to take on a frightful new enemy and save the art of kung fu.

Title: Life as We Know It
Synopsis: Holly and Eric discover reciprocal hatred during their first date, but must put their feelings aside after becoming guardians of their friends' baby.

Title: Mary Magdalene
Synopsis: A woman with healing powers abandons her village life to become a devout disciple of Jesus, the founder of Christianity.

Title: Memoirs of a Geisha
Synopsis: Sold to a geisha house as a child, a fisherman’s daughter becomes the most sought-after geisha in Kyoto, but rivalries threaten the destiny she desires.

Title: Naruto Shippûden the Movie: Bonds
Synopsis: When strange ninjas ambush the village of Konohagakure, it's up to adolescent ninja Naruto and his long-missing pal, Sasuke, to save the planet.

Title: Midnight Run
Synopsis: A cop-turned-bounty hunter runs into trouble as he races from New York to Los Angeles with a fugitive accountant who embezzled millions from the mob.

Title: Mortal Kombat
Synopsis: Three fighters travel to the mystical realm of Outworld to test their might in a tournament against an evil demon with plans to take over the world.

Title: Mother's Day
Synopsis: The trials and tribulations of several Atlanta moms (and one clueless widower dad) make it a Mother's Day to remember in this ensemble comedy.

Title: No Strings Attached
Synopsis: "Friends with benefits" Emma and Adam are fine with their open relationship ... until those pesky little things called feelings enter the picture.

Title: Not Another Teen Movie
Synopsis: On a bet, a gridiron hero at John Hughes High School sets out to turn a bespectacled artist into a prom queen in this outrageous parody.

Title: Ophelia
Synopsis: In this retelling of “Hamlet” from Ophelia’s point of view, the lady-in-waiting’s shared love with Denmark’s prince is ruined by treachery and madness.

Title: Naruto Shippûden the Movie: The Will of Fire
Synopsis: When four out of five ninja villages are destroyed, the leader of the one spared tries to find the true culprit and protect his land.

Title: Red Joan
Synopsis: When an unassuming elderly widow is arrested for treason, her tangled secret past as the KGB's longest-serving British spy is exposed.

Title: Seven Pounds
Synopsis: Weighed down by a dark secret, IRS agent Ben Thomas tries to improve the lives of seven strangers in need of a second chance.

Title: She's Out of My League
Synopsis: Kirk's a 5. His new girlfriend Molly's a 10. No one knows what she sees in him, including Kirk. Will his raging insecurities ruin this budding romance?

Title: Snow Day
Synopsis: When a snow day shuts down the whole town, the Wheeler family cuts loose. Hal makes a play for the most popular girl in his school, 10-year-old Natalie takes on the dreaded snowplow man, and Dad gets into a showdown with a rival meteorologist.

Title: Star Trek
Synopsis: On their first voyage aboard the starship Enterprise, cocky rebel James T. Kirk and logic-driven Vulcan Spock try to defeat a vengeful Romulan commander.

Title: Stuart Little
Synopsis: When his parents adopt a mouse instead of a little boy, George realizes brothers come in all shapes and sizes. But Snowbell the cat is not so welcoming.

Title: Sword of Trust
Synopsis: An offbeat foursome takes a wild journey through the Southern belt of denial to sell a relic purporting to prove the South won the Civil War.

Title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
Synopsis: NASCAR superstar Ricky Bobby believes he's the best there is, until the arrival of a French Formula One champion threatens his position as top dog.

Title: The American
Synopsis: Dispatched to a small Italian town to await further orders, assassin Jack embarks on a double life that may be more relaxing than is good for him.

Title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie
Synopsis: The adventures of adolescent ninja Naruto Uzumaki continue as he's tasked with protecting a priestess from a demon – but to do so, he must die.

Title: The Best of Enemies
Synopsis: In 1971, a summit on school integration in North Carolina pits a civil rights activist against a Ku Klux Klan leader, sparking an unlikely friendship.

Title: The Game
Synopsis: An aloof investment banker's life spirals into peril and paranoia after his brother gives him an odd birthday gift: the chance to play a mysterious game.

Title: The Karate Kid
Synopsis: When a bullied teen befriends an unassuming martial arts master, he’ll learn life lessons — and the right moves — to beat back his merciless rivals.

Title: The Karate Kid Part II
Synopsis: Daniel and his martial-arts mentor, Mr. Miyagi, visit Okinawa where they battle a hostile new nemesis and a former foe looking to settle an old score.

Title: The Karate Kid Part III
Synopsis: A returning adversary threatens the bond between karate champ Daniel and mentor Mr. Miyagi with an intricate plan for revenge and a brutal challenger.

Title: The Life of David Gale
Synopsis: When a Texas professor and advocate for the elimination of the death penalty is falsely accused of a crime, he ends up on death row himself.

Title: The Long Riders
Synopsis: This Western chronicles the misadventures and demise of the James-Younger gang, 19th-century outlaws who tore through Missouri on a crime spree.

Title: The Queen
Synopsis: After Princess Diana's death, Queen Elizabeth II and Tony Blair face public demands that she be memorialized in a manner beyond standard protocol.

Title: The Strangers
Synopsis: A quiet stay at a remote vacation home spirals into terror for a couple when they come under attack by three masked, mysterious, murderous intruders.

Title: The Sum of All Fears
Synopsis: CIA agent Jack Ryan tries to discover why three missing Russian nuclear scientists are holed up in the Ukraine, communicating with neo-Nazis.

Title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie: The Lost Tower
Synopsis: When Naruto is sent to recover a missing nin, the rogue manages to send him 20 years into the past, where he unites with his father to battle evil.

Title: The Tourist
Synopsis: An American tourist seeking solace for his shattered heart instead finds it in danger again after encountering a beautiful Interpol agent.

Title: Underworld
Synopsis: A vampire warrior begins to question her mission in the ancient war between the undead and werewolves when she falls for a human under her protection.

Title: Underworld: Awakening
Synopsis: As the war between vampires and Lycans rages on, Selene awakens from a prolonged, forced cryogenic sleep to face a harrowing new enemy: humans.

Title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
Synopsis: Set in the year 1402, this prequel follows Lucian, the first werewolf to take human form, and chronicles the feud between the vampires and the Lycans.

Title: Voiceless
Synopsis: A bright and promising young girl gets abducted and taken to a terrorist camp, where she unexpectedly crosses paths with her soulmate.

Title: What Dreams May Come
Synopsis: A physician finds himself in heaven after an accident, inhabiting the landscape of his wife's paintings while seeking to rescue her from the underworld.

Title: Why Do Fools Fall in Love
Synopsis: In this rock 'n' roll comedy-drama, three women go to court over royalties from the one-hit-wonder singer they all loved — and whom they all married.

Title: America: The Motion Picture
Synopsis: A chainsaw-wielding George Washington teams with beer-loving bro Sam Adams to take down the Brits in a tongue-in-cheek riff on the American Revolution.

Title: Naruto the Movie 2: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
Synopsis: While on a mission to return a missing pet, Naruto and two fellow ninjas are ambushed by brutal knights led by the enigmatic Temujin.

Title: Lying and Stealing
Synopsis: A talented thief teams up with an aspiring actress to steal art from LA's high rollers. For their last heist, they're going for the ultimate: freedom.

Title: Naruto the Movie 3: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom
Synopsis: Exuberant ninja Naruto teams up with his pals Sakura and Kakashi to escort Prince Michiru and his son, Hikaru, to the Crescent Moon kingdom.

Title: Killing Them Softly
Synopsis: When a couple of low-level crooks rob a Mob-protected poker game, a slick enforcer is hired to track down the offenders and take care of business.

Title: Wonder Boy
Synopsis: This revealing documentary follows Balmain creative director Olivier Rousteing as he brings his bold designs to life and goes in search of his origins.

Title: Here Comes the Rain
Synopsis: Abducted during the Lebanese Civil War and now in his 50s, Ramez is finally a free man. But he returns to society deeply traumatized by the past.

Title: The Ice Road
Synopsis: To save a team of miners trapped underground, a down-on-his-luck ice road trucker joins a mission across treacherous terrain to deliver rescue equipment.

Title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
Synopsis: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura learn they'll be protecting an actress from being hurt while making her next film, but it turns out she's a princess.

Title: The Seventh Day
Synopsis: An inexperienced priest teams up with a hardened exorcist to stop the demonic possession of a young boy. But darkness lies where they least expect it.

Title: O Vendedor de Sonhos
Synopsis: A disillusioned psychologist tries to commit suicide until he strikes up a friendship with an unlikely savior who teaches him a new way of living.

Title: Osuofia in London
Synopsis: A villager in Nigeria becomes the sole beneficiary of his late brother's estate in England, which, according to custom, includes his brother's fiancée.

Title: #Selfie
Synopsis: Two days before their final exams, three teen girls make a seaside getaway to have the time of their lives.

Title: #Selfie 69
Synopsis: After a painful breakup, a trio of party-loving friends makes a bet: who can get married in three days.

Title: Love Is a Story
Synopsis: Two young artists, a violin player and an actress, fight to achieve their dreams and keep their relationship together during Christmastime.

Title: Riverdale
Synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of sex, romance, school and family, teen Archie and his gang become entangled in a dark Riverdale mystery.

Title: They've Gotta Have Us
Synopsis: Powered by candid recollections from esteemed African-American entertainers, this docuseries traces the history of black cinema.

Title: Fatherhood
Synopsis: A widowed new dad copes with doubts, fears, heartache and dirty diapers as he sets out to raise his daughter on his own. Inspired by a true story.

Title: Kambili: The Whole 30 Yards
Synopsis: Determined to marry before she turns 30, a woman tries to change her impulsive ways and do whatever it takes to win back the boyfriend who left her.

Title: Aziza
Synopsis: This short film follows a newly displaced Syrian couple's drive around Beirut, which then morphs into a hallucinatory and nostalgic trip.

Title: Fan Girl
Synopsis: An infatuated fan finds an unexpected way to meet her celebrity crush and discovers a dark reality behind the facade of fame and her fantasy world.

Title: Red Snow
Synopsis: Ambushed by the Taliban, a First Nations soldier from Canada gets captured but escapes in a harrowing journey that stirs up memories of love and loss.

Title: Silver Linings Playbook
Synopsis: A man with bipolar disorder moves home with his parents and makes a connection with a spirited widow, which helps both of them heal in unique ways.

Title: Biking Borders
Synopsis: Best friends Max and Nono bike from Berlin to Beijing, collecting donations to build a school for a unique fundraising adventure in this documentary.

Title: Lowriders
Synopsis: Caught up in the lowrider world of his father and embittered brother, an East LA graffiti artist grapples with a family feud while chasing his dreams.

Title: Security
Synopsis: After the assault of a young woman in their seaside town, a security expert and his family get caught in a powerful riptide of secrets and lies.

Title: FTA
Synopsis: The restored documentary captures the Pacific leg of the 1971 anti-Vietnam War "Free the Army" comedy tour and experiences on both sides of the stage.

Title: King of Boys
Synopsis: When a powerful businesswoman’s political ambitions are threatened by her underworld connections, the ensuing power struggle could cost her everything.

Title: Sankofa
Synopsis: On a photo shoot in Ghana, an American model slips back in time, becomes enslaved on a plantation and bears witness to the agony of her ancestral past.

Title: Kate
Synopsis: Slipped a fatal poison on her final job, a ruthless assassin working in Tokyo has less than 24 hours to find out who ordered the hit and exact revenge.

Title: Omo Ghetto: the Saga
Synopsis: Twins are reunited as a good-hearted female gangster and her uptight rich sister take on family, crime, cops and all of the trouble that follows them.

Title: The Great British Baking Show
Synopsis: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

Title: Paradise Hills
Synopsis: Uma wakes up in a lush tropical facility designed to turn willful girls into perfect ladies. That’s bad enough, but its real purpose is even worse.

Title: Show Dogs
Synopsis: A rough and tough police dog must go undercover with an FBI agent as a prim and proper pet at a dog show to save a baby panda from an illegal sale.

Title: If I Leave Here Tomorrow: A Film About Lynyrd Skynyrd
Synopsis: Using interviews and archival footage, this documentary charts the story of the legendary Southern rockers with a focus on front man Ronnie Van Zant.
